mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BABEL_TRANSLATION_LINK ( OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ATTRIBUTE_NAME, URN ) VALUES ( #{objectType}, #{objectId}, #{attributeName}, #{urn} ) ON CONFLICT (OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ATTRIBUTE_NAME) DO UPDATE SET URN = EXCLUDED.URN

INSERT INTO T_STATIC_TRANSLATION ( OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ATTRIBUTE_NAME, LANGUAGE_CODE, TRANSLATED_TEXT, IS_DEFAULT ) VALUES
( #{translation.objectType}, #{translation.objectId}, #{translation.attribute}, #{translation.languageCode}, #{translation.translation}, #{translation.defaultTranslation} )
ON CONFLICT (OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ATTRIBUTE_NAME, LANGUAGE_CODE) DO UPDATE SET TRANSLATED_TEXT = EXCLUDED.TRANSLATED_TEXT, IS_DEFAULT = EXCLUDED.IS_DEFAULT
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_STATIC_TRANSLATION WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = #{objectType} AND OBJECT_ID = #{objectId} AND ATTRIBUTE_NAME = #{attribute} AND object_type = #{objectType}
mapper.select: SELECT language_code, translated_text FROM V_RESOLVED_TRANSLATION WHERE object_id = #{processInstanceId} AND attribute_name = #{attribute} AND object_type = #{objectType}
